item.description:
How is your love life?  Do you have intimate friends and connections that feel satisfying to you?

 

Do have a place to share your deepest secrets?  Do you feel accepted and loved?

 

Have you ever felt moved to tears by a friend or lover sharing something they treasure?

 

Have you ever felt so safe and nurtured in relationship that you were able to let all of your defenses down?

 

 

In this FREE relationship workshop, based on the principles of the Human Awareness Institute, you will be led through a gentle series of exercises designed to open your heart and allow you to be more connected with others.  In this safe, supportive environment, your personal boundaries and choices will always be honored!

 

We expect this free workshop to fill quickly.  RSVP NOW to save your spot!

 

"Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it."

~Rumi


***Each event begins promptly at the scheduled time. We ask that you arrive 30-15 minutes beforehand so that you’re settled when the event starts. Note: There will be no admittance after the scheduled start time so as not to break the continuity of the Mini.
item.name: Enhance the Love and Intimacy in Your Life!
